mutants.code:
import re

def word_character_stats(text):
    vowels = ''
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)
    word_counts = dict()
    full_stats = dict()
    for word in words:
        word_counts[word] = words.count(word)
        char_count = len(word)
        vowel_count = sum((word.count(ch) for ch in vowels))
        consonant_count = char_count - vowel_count
        special_count = len(re.findall('[@_!#$%^&*()<>?/\\|}{~:]', word))
        full_stats[word] = {'word_count': word_counts[word], 'char_count': char_count, 'vowel_count': vowel_count, 'consonant_count': consonant_count, 'special_count': special_count}
    return full_stats

import re

def word_character_stats(text):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('', text)
    word_counts = dict()
    full_stats = dict()
    for word in words:
        word_counts[word] = words.count(word)
        char_count = len(word)
        vowel_count = sum((word.count(ch) for ch in vowels))
        consonant_count = char_count - vowel_count
        special_count = len(re.findall('[@_!#$%^&*()<>?/\\|}{~:]', word))
        full_stats[word] = {'word_count': word_counts[word], 'char_count': char_count, 'vowel_count': vowel_count, 'consonant_count': consonant_count, 'special_count': special_count}
    return full_stats

def word_character_stats(text):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)
    word_counts = dict()
    full_stats = dict()

    return full_stats

import re

def word_character_stats(text):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)
    word_counts = dict()

    return full_stats

import re

def word_character_stats(text):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)
    word_counts = dict()
    full_stats = dict()
    for word in words:
        word_counts[word] = words.count(word)
        char_count = len(word)
        vowel_count = sum((word.count(ch) for ch in vowels))

import re

def word_character_stats(text):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)
    word_counts = dict()
    full_stats = dict()
    for word in words:
        word_counts[word] = words.count(word)
        char_count = len(word)
        vowel_count = sum((word.count(ch) for ch in vowels))
        consonant_count = char_count - vowel_count
        special_count = len(re.findall('', word))
        full_stats[word] = {'word_count': word_counts[word], 'char_count': char_count, 'vowel_count': vowel_count, 'consonant_count': consonant_count, 'special_count': special_count}
    return full_stats
